remember_english: Remember to translate into English. As default language, it will be displayed in case of missing translation.
confirm_registration_message: To confirm your registration, click on the following link. If you are not the person who initiated this process, you can ignore this email.
email_footer: This email has been sent automatically following your steps on our platform. Please do not reply.
success_activation: Your account has been successfully activated. Welcome!
mail_send_to_you: An email has been sent to you.
error_encounter: An error has occurred, please contact the administrator.
